request_max: SELECT max("value") FROM "BAT_CARL"."autogen"."BAT_CARL" WHERE time > now()-24h AND "capteurs"='CARL_TAMB_HALL_MOY'
request_min: SELECT min("value") FROM "BAT_CARL"."autogen"."BAT_CARL" WHERE time > now()-24h AND "capteurs"='CARL_TAMB_HALL_MOY'
request_mean: SELECT last("value") FROM "BAT_CARL"."autogen"."BAT_CARL" WHERE time > now()-24h AND "capteurs"='CARL_TAMB_HALL_MOY'
